thread.title: Model proposes on runway to conclude Fashion Week
thread.title_full: Model proposes on runway to conclude Fashion Week

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: Model proposes on runway to conclude Fashion Week
text:
It's love on the runway at Fashion Week of Rochester as model Kyle Glickman proposed to his longtime girlfriend Ewa Hlebowicz. Modeling an ivory wedding gown from Stella Boutique in LeRoy, Hlebowicz received the surprise of her life when Glickman walked behind her and dropped to one knee asking for her hand in marriage. With tears in her eye, she said yes.
"He's my everything," Hlebowicz said.
Hlebowicz is a firefighter who has been modeling in Fashion Week of Rochester since its inception six years ago. Glickman is a professional model with a personal training business. The couple has been together for two years and live in Greece.
Glickman worked with Fashion Week organizer Meghan Mundy on the surprise proposal.
"I know how much Fashion Week means to her and I wanted her family and friends to be there," he said.
He presented her with a one and a third carat diamond ring set in white gold from Cornell's Jewelers.
Newly engaged couple Ewa Hlebowicz and Kyle Glickman smile at Fashion Week. (Photo: Mary Chao/staff phogorapher)
